:`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!''`` For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions,'' Eric Schmidt said in a blog post. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Bill Clinton Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman.
